hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{10+4}&\blue{=4 + 1}\\
\blue{14}&\blue{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $14$ is not the same as $5$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{2+3}&\purple{=4+0}\\
\purple{5}&\purple{=4}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $4$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{2+3}&\pink{=3+2}\\
\pink{5}&\pink{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $5$ is the same as $5$.
